select x.*,Y.ORMTQT_TP,'${bradno}' bradno ,'${spclno}' spclno,'${ormtno}' ormtno from ( select a.sptyno,a.spseno,a.SAMPNO,a.SAMPNM ,a.SUITNO,a.PACKQT,sum(ORMTQT) ORMTQT from ( select a.sptyno,a.spseno,b.SAMPNO,B.SAMPNM,nvl(bb.SUITNO,'T00') SUITNO,B.PACKQT,c.ormtqs ORMTQT from ord_sample_plan a inner join ord_sample_design b on a.plspno=b.plspno --inner join ord_sample_design_sizegp e on b.sampno=e.sampno left join ORD_SUIT_DC bb on bb.sptyno=a.sptyno and bb.sexno=b.sexno and bb.suitty=b.suitty and bb.spltmk=b.spltmk and bb.bradno=a.bradno left join (select c.* from ORD_ORDDTL c inner join ORD_ORD d on c.mtorno=d.mtorno and d.ORMTNO=#{ormtno} and d.ORTYNO='DZ') c on b.sampno=c.sampno and c.suitno=nvl(bb.SUITNO,'T00')
WHERE a.ORMTNO=#{ormtno} and not exists (select 1 from ORD_COMP_PAL p where a.ormtno=p.ormtno and b.sampno=p.sampno and p.paltpy='取消') --group by a.sptyno,a.spseno,b.SAMPNO,B.SAMPNM,bb.SUITNO,B.PACKQT ) a group by a.sptyno,a.spseno,a.SAMPNO,a.SAMPNM ,a.SUITNO,a.PACKQT ) x left join ( select B.SAMPNO,B.SUITNO,sum(ORMTQT) ORMTQT_TP from ORD_ORD A,ORD_ORDDTL B WHERE A.mtorno=B.mtorno AND A.ORMTNO=#{ormtno} and A.ORTYNO='TP' GROUP BY B.SAMPNO,B.SUITNO ) y on X.SAMPNO=Y.SAMPNO AND X.SUITNO=Y.SUITNO ORDER BY X.sptyno,X.spseno,X.SAMPNM,X.SUITNO
